PHRASE.LANG: 明るい色の木製のベッド
一人で寝ても二人で寝ても夢に見たものが現実になる、明るい木目調の不思議なベッド。[#Legal]
혼자서 자도 둘이서 자도 꿈에 나온 것이 현실이 되는, 밝은 목조의 신기한 침대. \n ※액티브 아이템은 보통 가구들 보다 더 많은 기능성을 제공합니다. 자신의 아파트나 클럽 하우스에는 한 번에 한정된 수량의 액티브 아이템밖에 설치할 수 없습니다.[#Legal]

A mysterious, light-toned wood bed that fits up to two and turns dreams into reality.\n ※Active items provide more functionality than a normal item. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time.[#Legal]
無論單獨睡覺還是二人同眠，這款不可思議色彩明亮的木床都會令夢境成真。\n ※動態道具可提供比一般道具更多的功能。因此您最多只能在個人空間或聯盟俱樂部擺設數量有限的動態道具。[#Legal]

一緒に寝そべっているアバターと重なりやすいポーズを選ぶと\n 一時的に相手が表示されなくなります
Wenn du eine Pose wählst, die leicht einen Avatar verdecken könnte, der mit dir schläft,\n wird die andere Person kurzzeitig nicht dargestellt.
If you choose a pose that easily overlaps with an avatar sleeping with you,\n the other person will temporarily not be displayed.
Si vous choisissez une position qui vous fait trop chevaucher l'avatar de la personne dormant avec vous,\n l'autre personne ne sera temporairement pas affichée.
Se scegli una posizione che si sovrappone a un eventuale avatar che sta dormendo con te,\n questo non verrà visualizzato temporaneamente.
Si eliges una postura en la que te solapas con un avatar que duerme junto a ti,\n la otra persona no será mostrada temporalmente.
If you choose a pose that easily overlaps with an avatar sleeping with you,\n the other person will temporarily not be displayed.
When you select a pose which easily overlaps with the avatar you are lying down with,\n the other avatar will temporarily not be displayed
함께 누워있는 아바타와 겹치기 쉬운 포즈를 선택하면\n 일시적으로 상대가 표시되지 않게 됩니다
選擇跟同時躺臥的分身角色容易重疊的姿勢的話\n 對方可能暫時無法被顯示出來

Es wurde eine Pose gewählt, bei der der Partner, mit dem du schläfst, verdeckt wird,\n deswegen wird die andere Person kurzzeitig nicht dargestellt.
A pose has been chosen that easily overlaps with the avatar sleeping with you,\n so the other person will temporarily not be displayed.
Vous avez choisi une position qui vous fait trop chevaucher l'avatar de la personne dormant avec vous,\n l'autre personne ne sera donc temporairement pas affichée.
Poiché hai scelto una posizione che si sovrappone con l'avatar che sta dormendo con te,\n questo non verrà visualizzato temporaneamente.
Has elegido una postura que se solapa con el avatar que duerme junto a ti,\n así que la otra persona no será mostrada temporalmente.
A pose has been chosen that easily overlaps with the avatar sleeping with you,\n so the other person will temporarily not be displayed.
Because a pose that can easily overlap with the avatar you are lying down with has been selected,\n the other avatar is temporarily not displayed
